JobFullDesc: The threat intelligence teams at Facebook are dedicated to protecting the users of our family of applications (e.g. Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Oculus) by leading intelligence development and integration, conducting deep dive analysis to identify adversarial threats and behaviors, delivering cross-problem awareness, and driving mitigation capabilities in the policy and product spaces. We are a mission-driven team with a passion for protecting people. We are seeking an experienced analyst/investigator with deep experience in applying the intelligence cycle, working across a large set of stakeholders to implement change, anticipating how the threat landscape will evolve, and recommending innovative mitigations against the range of 21st century threats. The role includes a broad swathe of adversarial behaviors, to include dangerous organizations and individuals, at-risk countries and emerging harms, influence operations, non-state violent organizations, and other cyber-supported abuses. You will have the opportunity to work on the most challenging, complicated, and high-visibility security risks the company is facing. The impact of your work will be substantial, as outcomes could affect the billions of people who use our products. The ideal candidate will be an innovative self-starter, who is motivated by our mission to prevent user harm through collaboratively developing proactive, novel, all-source intelligence on emerging
